characters.name: Greta
characters.description: The cheerful but shrewd innkeeper who knows all the town gossip.

dialogue.greeting: Ah, a new face in Wyrdwell! Stay awhile, and I'll make sure you're fit for your next adventure.
dialogue.rumors: You’ve heard the whispers, haven’t you? Dangerous business. Some folk claim it’s just the wind, but I know better.

characters.name: Edwin
characters.description: A fidgety shopkeeper who sells basic items and buys loot.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome, welcome! Just ignore the creaking floorboards—it’s all part of the charm, eh?
dialogue.buy_sell: If you’re looking for supplies, you’ve come to the right place. Need to offload something?

characters.name: Master Orin
characters.description: A gruff but honorable blacksmith who takes pride in his craft.

dialogue.greeting: This hammer’s seen more battles than you ever will, lad. You want it fixed, or are you here to gawk?
dialogue.advice: If you’re heading to the woods, you’d better be prepared. Bring me the right materials, and I’ll make sure you’re ready.

characters.name: Brand
characters.description: A burly but kind apprentice learning the trade under Master Orin.

dialogue.greeting: Oh, hey there! Master Orin’s busy, but I can help with the basics.

characters.name: Thorne
characters.description: A grizzled hunter with a sharp eye and a sharper wit.

dialogue.greeting: You’re not from around here, are you? Keep your wits about you in these woods. They’re not as quiet as they seem.

characters.name: Elara
characters.description: A wise herbalist who knows the secrets of the Whispering Woods.

dialogue.greeting: Ah, a new face in Wyrdwell! Stay awhile, and I'll make sure you're fit for your next adventure.
